alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LUCE COUNTY THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Grand Marais to 10 miles northwest of McMillan to near Seney. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Newberry, McMillan, Muskallonge State Park, Deer Park, Soo Junction, Four Mile Corner, Dollarville, Pine Stump Junction, Betsy Lake, and Crisp Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
